content.d: Isn’t it really hard to decide? There are so many to choose from.
Right?! But all the bread here is delicious! Everything here is a good option~
No, no! That’s not how it works! Choosing is part of the fun! Come on, Lanzhu-chan, enjoy the process.
Huh...? But it’s too hard for Lanzhu...... I want them all...
Then you should just choose the same one as me! Alright, I pick this one! Here you go, Lanzhu-chan!
That’s right! Isn’t it exciting? It’s so much fun!
Oh, you’re making me blush with that kind of enthusiasm~ Let’s buy some coffee milk and eat in the park.
Matching coffee milk too! This is the best!
